name: Anduin
short_description: Anduin aims to replace perl, python, tcl, and others as the workhorse language in industrial programming projects.  It places emphasis on enabling the interpreter to perform compile-time static code analysis as a means of closing the development loop faster and letting fewer bugs get to the user.
summary: A scripting language for industrial software
